paper.title: Artificial Counselor System for Stock Investment
paper.abstract: This paper proposes a novel trading system which plays the role of an artificial counselor for stock investment. In this paper, the stock future prices (technical features) are predicted using Support Vector Regression. Thereafter, the predicted prices are used to recommend which portions of the budget an investor should invest in different existing stocks to have an optimum expected profit considering their level of risk tolerance. Two different methods are used for suggesting best portions, which are Markowitz portfolio theory and fuzzy investment counselor. The first approach is an optimization-based method which considers merely technical features, while the second approach is based on Fuzzy Logic taking into account both technical and fundamental features of the stock market. The experimental results on New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) show the effectiveness of the proposed system.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用支持向量回归预测股票未来价格，并结合Markowitz投资组合理论和模糊逻辑来推荐投资组合，以优化预期利润并考虑投资者的风险承受能力。这直接涉及投资组合管理的核心问题。
